array.name: Boss
array.sentence: I’ve got a new contract for you.

array.name: Boss
array.sentence: But you can’t fuck this one up, the guy is some big tech mania that's worth A LOT of money apparently, and he needs to go down tonight.

array.name: Boss
array.sentence: For real though, if anything goes wrong, you, I, and all of us will be in big trouble.

array.name: Boss
array.sentence: You should use the sewer network to get there, I'll send you the details.

array.name: Boss
array.sentence: You're the only one I trust for this. Be quick, be discrete and everything will go well.

array.name: Boss
array.sentence: Alright get moving, nights are short.
